HOTSPOT -
A company sells and maintains heating and air conditioning equipment. The company uses Dynamics 365 Field Service.
The company is evaluating Field Service Mobile for technicians.
For each of the following statements, select Yes if the statement is true. Otherwise, select No.

questions.answer_description:
Box 1: Yes -
When technicians are working on a work order they can add your notes, attachments, pictures, and signatures.

Box 2: Yes -
Field Service Mobile lets technicians work online or offline. Online mode requires an Internet connection; offline mode does not.

comments.content: "Portal" threw me off too. But, that is because I was thinking of "Power Apps Portal" where you enable external access to the apps. There isn't a Power Platform portal that I know of. I would choose "Power Platform", "Power Automate", or "Power Apps" as an answer.

discussion.content: For the 2nd question: How would a "Portal" be able to send notification? Either the question is wrong or answer is wrong. If the answer is "Power Platform" without the "portal" it would be correct since it include Flow/Power Automate. If I have to choose an answer I'd choose "SMS-text message", but if there is option of "Power Platform" or "MS Flow", will go with them, since purely SMS message wouldn't satisfy the requirement either.
